N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 107.1 - Closing the Thruway system

State Regulations

When conditions, actual or potential, are present, which
might endanger the health, safety or welfare of any person or cause damage or
destruction to property, the Thruway Authority's executive director, or his
designee, may order that the Thruway system, or any portion thereof, be closed
to all or any part of the public for such time as in his judgment may be
necessary. These conditions include, but are not limited to, fire, flood, snow, rain, hail, wind, accident, overcrowding, riot, civil commotion, epidemic, explosion and chemical or nuclear incident. Notes
